languages.text: {n}Маражай потирает лицо, покрытое синяками от полопавшихся под кожей сосудов. Его голос сочится презрением.{/n} "Держи своего наложника на цепи покороче, {name} — в иной раз я могу и сломать твою маленькую игрушку".

{n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай потирает лицо, покрытое синяками от полопавшихся под кожей сосудов. Его голос сочится презрением.{/n} "Держи своего наложника на цепи покороче, {name} — в иной раз я могу и сломать твою маленькую игрушку".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your concubine on a shorter leash, {name}, I might break your little toy next time."

{n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your concubine on a shorter leash, {name}, I might break your little toy next time."

{n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

{n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se frotte le visage, rendu écarlate par l'éclatement de vaisseaux sanguins sous sa peau. Sa voix déborde de mépris.{/n} « Tenez votre mâle reproducteur en laisse, {name}. Votre jouet pourrait bien ne pas survivre si la situation venait à se représenter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se frotte le visage, rendu écarlate par l'éclatement de vaisseaux sanguins sous sa peau. Sa voix déborde de mépris.{/n} « Tenez votre mâle reproducteur en laisse, {name}. Votre jouet pourrait bien ne pas survivre si la situation venait à se représenter. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋揉着脸，脸上的皮下血管破裂，淤青一片。他的声音中带着轻蔑之意。{/n}“你得管好你这个小钢炮，{name}。如果再敢搞出这种事情，说不定我会弄坏你的小玩具。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋揉着脸，脸上的皮下血管破裂，淤青一片。他的声音中带着轻蔑之意。{/n}“你得管好你这个小钢炮，{name}。如果再敢搞出这种事情，说不定我会弄坏你的小玩具。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、皮膚の下の血管が破裂してあざだらけになった顔をさすった。その声には軽蔑の色がにじんでいる。{/n}「そいつをもっと短い鎖でつないでおけ、{name}。お前の小さなオモチャを、次は壊してしまうかもしれんぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、皮膚の下の血管が破裂してあざだらけになった顔をさすった。その声には軽蔑の色がにじんでいる。{/n}「そいつをもっと短い鎖でつないでおけ、{name}。お前の小さなオモチャを、次は壊してしまうかもしれんぞ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai reibt sich das Gesicht, das unter der Haut von aufgeplatzten Blutgefäßen übersät ist. Seine Stimme trieft vor Verachtung.{/n} "Legt Euren Zuchthengst an eine kürzere Leine, {name}, sonst mache ich Euer kleines Spielzeug beim nächsten Mal vielleicht kaputt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reibt sich das Gesicht, das unter der Haut von aufgeplatzten Blutgefäßen übersät ist. Seine Stimme trieft vor Verachtung.{/n} "Legt Euren Zuchthengst an eine kürzere Leine, {name}, sonst mache ich Euer kleines Spielzeug beim nächsten Mal vielleicht kaputt."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se frota la cara, amoratada por los vasos sanguíneos que le han estallado bajo la piel. Su voz rezuma odio.{/n} «Ata más en corto a tu perro psíquico, {name}, o la próxima vez romperé tu juguetito».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se frota la cara, amoratada por los vasos sanguíneos que le han estallado bajo la piel. Su voz rezuma odio.{/n} «Ata más en corto a tu perro psíquico, {name}, o la próxima vez romperé tu juguetito».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, cildinin altındaki kan damarlarının yırtılması sonucu moraran yüzünü ovuşturuyor. Sesinden kibir akarcasına konuşuyor.{/n} "Şu damızlığının tasmasının ipini iyi tut {name}. Bir daha elinden kaçırırsan oyuncağını kırarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his face, bruised from the ruptured blood vessels under the skin. His voice oozes contempt.{/n} "Keep your broodmale on a shorter leash, {name}. I might break your little plaything next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünü ovuşturuyor. Cildinin altındaki kan damarları yırtılınca yüzü morarmış. Kibirli kibirli konuşuyor.{/n} "Şu damızlığının tasmasının ipini bir daha elinden kaçırma {name}. Yoksa bir dahaki sefere kırarım oyuncağını."
